## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |

## ğŸ›¡ Reporting a Vulnerability
If you discover a security vulnerability:

1. Do NOT open a public issue.
2. Email us at: <your email or GitHub profile contact>
3. Provide:
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Impact of the issue
   - Possible fixes (optional)

We will respond within **48â€“72 hours**.

## ğŸ”’ Responsible Disclosure
Please allow us adequate time to fix the vulnerability before public disclosure.
